creditline: Gift of the family of Esther Parada:  Adam Wilson, son; Margo Davion and Susan Peters, sisters; and Benjamin Glaser, brother
description: man wearing a poncho and sandals at left, seated on a stone bench; man is looking at a child, seen from back, wearing a cap, sweater and pants; another standing figure at right
inscription:
Inscription and Label

on back, in black ink: [(TARABUCO, BOLIVIA) / CAMPESINO AND SMALL BOY]
title: Campesino and Small Boy, Tarabuco, Bolivia
